channel.title: ECE580 Introduction to Machine Learning on Writeplace
channel.description: Recent content in ECE580 Introduction to Machine Learning on Writeplace

item.description: Linear Regression # linear regression vs non-linear regression # linear: straight line non-linear: curved line Major steps of linear regression # select a model template generate a number of sampling points measure function (f) values at these sampling points create a set of linear equations to solve model coefficients solve overdetermined linear equations 1. Ordinary least-squares regression # overdetermined: # of equations is greater than # of coefficients
